content.raw:
The alignment says has labels X, Y, and Z, but there's no indication for what those directions mean in the 3D rendered gazebo scene. I have to just click one to see which direction it is.

As a developer, I know that I can hold x, y, or z while panning to move the camera along those axes, but without that knowledge, it's not immediately discoverable.
